Name: SkillContext
Description:
The Skillset Authoring API exposes endpoints allowing a skill to interact with the current session to perform actions such as accessing previous prompts/responses within the current session, 
reading the inputs of the skill, invoking other skills, reporting progress of execution, returning results/errors, acquiring tokens to access other resources, and retrieving skill specific settings.

Enums.Name: SkillsetCategory

AllowedValues.Name: Hidden
AllowedValues.Description: Default value if a category is not specified. The skillset willnot appear in the UI

AllowedValues.Name: Microsoft
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset interacts with Microsoft services only

AllowedValues.Name: Other
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset interacts with 3rd party service

AllowedValues.Name: Web
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset interacts with public facing web services

AllowedValues.Name: Testing
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset is used for testing and debugging purposes

AllowedValues.Name: Plugin
AllowedValues.Description: THe skillset of of a plugin format, such as ChatGPT or LogicApp plugins

Enums.Description: Defines the category of the data source/API that the skillset interacts with

Enums.Name: SkillsetCatalogScope

AllowedValues.Name: None
AllowedValues.Description: No scope specified

AllowedValues.Name: User
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset is scoped to the calling user

AllowedValues.Name: Workspace
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset is scoped to the calling user's workspace TODO what does this mean

AllowedValues.Name: Tenant
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset is scoped to the calling user's tenant

AllowedValues.Name: Global
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset is available globally

Enums.Description: The scope of a skillset in the skillset catalog

AllowedValues.Name: SecretString

AllowedValues.Name: String
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset setting is a string

AllowedValues.Name: AAD
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset supports AAD authentication

AllowedValues.Name: ServiceHttp
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset supports service HTTP authentication TODO what does this mean

AllowedValues.Name: AADDelegated
AllowedValues.Description: The skillset supports AAD delegated authentication TODO what does this mean

Enums.Description: Defines the authentication types supported by a skillset

Models.Name: SkillContextResponse
Models.Description: SkillContext object containing properties of the current session relevant to the invoked skill

Properties.Name: descriptor
Properties.Description: Skill descriptor containing attributes that describe a skill (i.e. Inputs required to execute the skill)

Properties.Name: skillset
Properties.Description: The skillset descriptor

Properties.Name: namespace
Properties.Description: Namespace for the skillset

Properties.Name: name
Properties.Description: The name of the Skillset

Properties.Name: description
Properties.Description: The description of the Skillset

Properties.Name: descriptionDisplay
Properties.Description: The description of the skillset that's displayed TODO postman/dev figure out where this is displayed

Properties.Name: disaplyName
Properties.Description: The Skillset name that's displayed in the portal

Properties.Name: icon
Properties.Description: The icon displayed for the skillset in the console

Properties.Name: category
Properties.Description: The category of the Skillset

Properties.Name: catalogScope
Properties.Description: CatalogScope of the Skillset

Properties.Name: enabled
Properties.Description: Whether the skillset is enabled TODO how is this different than Hidden

Properties.Name: hidden
Properties.Description: Whether the skillset is hidden TODO how is this different than enabled

Properties.Name: prerequisites
Properties.Description: The prerequisites of a skillset TODO what does this mean

Properties.Name: settings
Properties.Description: The settings of a skillset

ElementType.Name: SkillsetSetting
ElementType.Description: Defines the settings of a skillset

Properties.Name: name
Properties.Description: The name of the skillset setting

Properties.Name: label
Properties.Description: The label of the skillset setting

Properties.Name: description
Properties.Description: The description of the skillset setting used to describe the setting to the user in an info text box

Properties.Name: hintText
Properties.Description: The hint text used to fill in the setting box

Properties.Name: settingType
Properties.Description: The type of the skillset setting

Properties.Name: required
Properties.Description: Whether the skillset setting is required

Properties.Name: defaultValue
Properties.Description: The default value of the skillset setting

Properties.Name: value
Properties.Description: The value of the skillset setting

Properties.Name: authorization
Properties.Description: The settings of a skillset

Type.Name: SkillsetAuth
Type.Description: The authorization settings for the skillset

Properties.Name: type
Properties.Description: SkillsetAuth Type

Properties.Name: supportedAuthTypes
Properties.Description: The types of authentication supported by the skillset

Properties.Name: userVisibilityFeatureFlags
Properties.Description: A list of feature flags. At least one of the feature flags is required to enabled in the prompt context in order for the skillset to be available

Properties.Name: userVisibility
Properties.Description: Controls the conditions under which the users can see or use this skillset

Properties.Name: plannerVisibilityFeatureFlags
Properties.Description: Visibility flags required for the planner to user the skillset TODO confirm what this does

Properties.Name: plannerVisibility
Properties.Description: Controls the conditions under a prompt can use this skillset

Properties.Name: creatorUserId
Properties.Description: The user ID of the user who created this skillset.

Properties.Name: ownersGroupId
Properties.Description: The ID of an Entra group that contains the owners for this Skillset

Properties.Name: name
Properties.Description: The name of the skill

Properties.Name: format
Properties.Description: The format of the skill

Properties.Name: displayName
Properties.Description: The display name of the skill

Properties.Name: altName
Properties.Description: An alternative name for the skill as some planners follow different naming convensions. This is set by the planner to map the name back to the skill

Models.Name: InvokeSkillRequest
Models.Description: Invoke skill request including necessary inputs for invoking a skill

Properties.Name: skillsetName
Properties.Description: Name of skillset in which desired skill to invoke resides

Properties.Name: skillName
Properties.Description: Name of skill to be invoked

Properties.Name: inputs
Properties.Description: Skill inputs

Models.Name: OutputSkillVariable
Models.Description: Skill variable parent entity adding additional attribute 'skillsource' to provide visibility to users as to what data/information was used in generating the output of a skill

Properties.Name: sources
Properties.Description: Array of cited sources that were fetched by a skill and that impacted the output of the skill evaluation

ElementType.Name: SkillSource
ElementType.Description: Source that is fetched during the evaluation of a skill. Provides visibility to users as to what data/information was used in generating the output of a skill

Properties.Name: displayName
Properties.Description: User friendly name for the information source

Properties.Name: sourceContent
Properties.Description: Information source content (i.e. URL to article)

Properties.Name: sourceType
Properties.Description: The source type (i.e. URI)

Properties.Name: sourceSerializedData
Properties.Description: Source data serialized as string

Models.Description: The prompt history of the current session

Properties.Name: prompts
Properties.Description: List of prompts that have been evaluated in the current session

ElementType.Description: A record for a prompt and response used in tracking session prompt history

Properties.Name: prompt
Properties.Description: The content of the prompt

Properties.Name: response
Properties.Description: Prompt response returned by the prompt evaluation

Properties.Name: inputName
Properties.Description: Input Name

Properties.Name: defaultValue
Properties.Description: Default value for the input

Properties.Name: sources
Properties.Description: List of SkillSource

Clients.Name: SkillContextClient
Clients.Description:
The Skillset Authoring API exposes endpoints allowing a skill to interact with the current session to perform actions such as accessing previous prompts/responses within the current session, 
reading the inputs of the skill, invoking other skills, reporting progress of execution, returning results/errors, acquiring tokens to access other resources, and retrieving skill specific settings.

Operations.Name: getSkillContext
Operations.Description: Get the SkillContext for the current skill invocation

Parameters.Name: endpoint
Parameters.Description:
Supported Security Copilot API endpoints (protocol and host name, such as
https://api.medeina-dev.defender.microsoft.com).

Operations.Name: invokeSkill
Operations.Description: Invokes a skill. Allows current skill to invoke dependency skills.

Operations.Name: logProgress
Operations.Description: Log a progress message for a skill invocation

Operations.Name: setSkillInvocationStarted
Operations.Description: Notifies security copilot backend service that the skill has been invoked

Operations.Name: setSkillInvocationCompleted
Operations.Description: Notifies security copilot backend service that the skill invocation has completed

Operations.Name: getSkillsetAuthInfo
Operations.Description: Gets the skillset auth related information

Operations.Name: setInput
Operations.Description: Sets the input for the skill

Operations.Name: addSources
Operations.Description: Adds a list of sources to the output
